description: I hold a Master’s degree in Computer Science from the University of Lahore (2021), with a major in Artificial Intelligence, Advanced AI, and Evolutionary Computing, and a minor in Multimedia Systems and Wireless Networks. My thesis focused on diagnosing pneumonia using a hybrid deep learning model, achieving 97.78% accuracy, and I worked on projects involving genetic algorithm-based optimization and reinforcement learning, gaining advanced expertise in applied AI and machine learning.
activitiesandsocieties: Deep Reinforcement Learning-Based Cart Pole Agent

description: I hold a Bachelor’s degree in Information Technology from the University of Sargodha (2017), with a focus on Image Processing and Machine Learning. My coursework combined technical expertise in multimedia systems and programming with practical applications like sign language recognition using shape moments analysis.

I am currently pursuing a Bachelor of Education (B.Ed) degree from GC Faisalabad (2023–2025), with a focus on leveraging AI to assist students, understanding factors that influence learning, and enhancing the overall educational experience through technology.
